page.title: 01Stillingfleet-Kelfield Area
page.content:
There are three villages in this area Stillingfleet, the smaller Kelfield and Acaster Selby, a small widely scattered hamlet. It is a very quiet and rural area with occasional disturbance from nearby R.A.F. Church Fenton.
{ The only industry is agriculture, {although the nearby developing Selby {coalfield is giving rise to fears of {subsidence. { It is not a smokeless zone. The area {has mains electricity and water but {no gas. { { There is one bus company operating in {the area. The buses are two-hourly {between York & Selby, running between {the intervening villages, with some {extra buses in peak periods, but no {Sunday service. }
